summary: This document is a certificate of existence for Hyperion Air, LLC, issued by Osbert E. Potter, the Lieutenant Governor of the Virgin Islands. It confirms that the company is duly organized under the laws of the United States Virgin Islands and has met all necessary requirements.

persons.name: Osbert E. Potter
persons.context: Osbert E. Potter certifies the existence of Hyperion Air, LLC, confirming its organization and compliance with local laws.

keyFacts: Hyperion Air, LLC was organized on October 19, 2012.
The company has a perpetual duration.
All applicable fees have been paid by the company.
No Articles of Termination have been filed for the company.
